1.speaker: GUY1
1.character: すげえな パンダって。

2.speaker: GUY2
2.character: 冬はあんな感じなんだな～
2.definition: I guess that's what  they do in winter. Time for foo— Wh-What are you doing?! Oh, Mr. Handa, you came at a good time.

3.speaker: PANDA
3.character: お茶 いれてきてよ。
3.definition: Could you make me some tea?

4.speaker: HANDA
4.definition: Jeez, what kind of zoo has pandas using heated tables?

7.speaker: HANDA
7.character: 大丈夫じゃないでしょ!

9.speaker: FT PANDA
9.character: だってさ パンダくん。

10.speaker: FT PANDA
10.character: 若者は タイヤで遊んだらいいよ。
10.definition: Younguns should be playing with the tire. I'm gonna hang out here with the heater a little bit longer.

11.speaker: HANDA
11.character: 常勤パンダさんもダメ!
11.definition: You can't be in there, either, Mr. Full-Time Panda! What? Really?

12.speaker: HANDA
12.character: コタツは 禁止です!
12.definition: Heated tables are prohibited. Miss Sasako.

14.speaker: PENGUIN
14.character: こうやってパタパタさせるのと

15.speaker: PENGUIN
15.character: こうやって パタパタさせるの
15.definition: or when I flap like this...

16.speaker: PENGUIN
16.character: どっちが かわいいかな?
16.definition: Which is cuter? Could I treat this as a take-home quiz?

17.speaker: PENGUIN
17.character: パッと答えるんで いいんだけど。
17.definition: An immediate reply would be just fine,

18.speaker: PENGUIN
18.character: ヒマな時間に なんとなく話す雑談だからさ。
18.definition: considering this is supposed to be idle conversation since I'm bored...

19.speaker: SASAKO
19.character: じゃあ どっちもかわりません。
19.definition: Then they're both exactly the same.

20.speaker: PENGUIN
20.definition: Oh, I see. What's wrong, Panda? I don't understand Mr. Handa. What happened?

21.speaker: PANDA
21.character: あのね…。パンダコーナーにコタツは ダメだっていうんだ～。
21.definition: Well... He says heated tables aren't allowed at the Panda Corner!

22.speaker: PENGUIN
22.character: 笹子さん カフェモカおかわり。
22.definition: Could I get another café mocha, Miss Sasako? Listen to me...

23.speaker: PENGUIN
23.character: キミの 話聞いて 損しちゃったよ。
23.definition: I just wasted my time listening to you.

24.speaker: PANDA
24.character: じゃあ ペンギンさんのしたい話でいいよ。
24.definition: Then we can talk about what you want, Mr. Penguin.

26.speaker: SASAKO
26.character: こうやってパタパタさせるのと

27.speaker: SASAKO
27.character: こうやってパタパタさせるの

28.speaker: SASAKO
28.character: どっちがかわいいかって。
28.definition: He was asking which is cuter. That's okay, Miss Sasako. We can let that go now. By the way, where's Polar Bear today?

29.speaker: SASAKO
29.definition: He said he was going shopping. Shopping?

30.speaker: GRIZZLY
30.character: だいぶ 寒くなってきたな。

31.speaker: POLAR BEAR
31.character: グリズリーくん いつから冬眠するの?
31.definition: When are you going to start hibernating, Grizzly?

32.speaker: GRIZZLY
32.definition: It's more like staying inside for winter rather than hibernating.

33.speaker: GRIZZLY
33.character: 今週中には 入らねえとな。
33.definition: I've gotta start sometime this week.

34.speaker: GRIZZLY
34.character: おっ この枕よさそうだな。
34.definition: Hey, this pillow looks good. It's memory foam. Actually this magnetic pillow might be better for sleeping.

35.speaker: GRIZZLY
35.character: ヒノキを使った枕もリラクゼーション的には いいよな…。
35.definition: Pillows made with Japanese cypress are good for relaxation, too. Hey, Grizzly. Yeah?

36.speaker: POLAR BEAR
36.character: プリンアラモード 食べに行こうよ。
36.definition: Let's go eat pudding à la mode.

37.speaker: GRIZZLY
37.definition: Later. I'm gonna be sleeping for a while,

38.character: 枕は 真剣に選ばねえと。
38.definition: so the right pillow is important.

39.speaker: POLAR BEAR
39.character: じゃあ 氷枕がいいよ。
39.definition: Then an ice pillow will work. Actually, just ice.

41.speaker: GRIZZLY
41.character: 氷でなんか寝たら死んじまうよ。
41.definition: If I slept on ice, I'd die. I could also go with the buckwheat pillows.

42.speaker: GRIZZLY
42.character: 発泡ビーズか。 悪くねえ。
42.definition: Foam beads, huh? Not bad. What the hell, this is hard. Hey!

43.speaker: POLAR BEAR
43.character: もう あとでになった?

44.speaker: GRIZZLY
44.character: 紛らわしいことすんな!

45.speaker: GRIZZLY
45.definition: What the hell are you, a grade schooler?

46.speaker: GRIZZLY
46.character: プリンアラモードはあとで食いにいくから
46.definition: We'll go eat pudding à la mode later,

47.character: 今は 枕に集中させてくれよ!
47.definition: so let me just concentrate on picking a pillow right now.

48.speaker: POLAR BEAR
48.character: じゃあ グリズリーくんのおごりね。
48.definition: Then it'll be your treat, Grizzly.

49.speaker: GRIZZLY
49.character: なんで俺がおごらなきゃいけねえんだよ。
49.definition: Why the hell do I have to treat you? All right, fine. Just keep quiet.

51.speaker: GRIZZLY
51.character: だから やめろ それ!
51.definition: I'm telling you to stop that.

52.speaker: POLAR BEAR
52.definition: Thanks for the food. You still haven't decided?

54.speaker: GRIZZLY
54.character: 冬眠には 枕選びが大切なんだよ。
54.definition: Choosing the right pillow is essential for hibernation.

56.speaker: POLAR BEAR
56.character: じゃあ おかわりしていい?

58.speaker: GRIZZLY
58.character: じゃあそのかわりこのあと デパートつきあえよ!
58.definition: Then you better come with me to the department store.

59.speaker: GRIZZLY
59.character: あそこの枕コーナー充実してるからよ。
59.definition: The pillow department there is pretty solid.

61.speaker: GRIZZLY
61.character: うるせえ! つきあえ!
61.definition: Shut up. You're coming with me.

62.speaker: GRIZZLY
62.definition: All right. The pillows are on the sixth floor.

63.speaker: POLAR BEAR
63.character: さすがに いろいろ ありそうだね～。
63.definition: I bet they'll have quite a selection.

64.speaker: GRIZZLY
64.definition: Well, this is a department store.

65.speaker: POLAR BEAR
65.character: あっ! インドカレー 食べようよ。
65.definition: Hey, let's eat some Indian curry.

66.speaker: GRIZZLY
66.character: プリンアラモード ５杯 食っただろ!
66.definition: You just ate five  pudding à la modes! I think there are more important things in life than pillows, Grizzly.

67.speaker: GRIZZLY
67.character: それは インドカレーじゃねえな。
67.definition: And that Indian curry ain't one of 'em.

68.speaker: POLAR BEAR
68.character: あっ! クリスマスプレゼントは買わないの?
68.definition: Oh, don't you need to buy some Christmas presents?

69.speaker: GRIZZLY
69.character: 俺が寝ている間のイベントなんか知らねえよ!
69.definition: I don't care about an event that goes on while I'm asleep. Quit it. We're going to the sixth floor.

70.speaker: POLAR BEAR
70.character: プレゼント選ぶの 楽しいのにな～。
70.definition: But it's so much fun picking out presents.

71.speaker: POLAR BEAR
71.character: あっ この のりとサラダ油
71.definition: So, this nori seaweed set and this vegetable oil set...

72.definition: Which do you think is better?

76.speaker: POLAR BEAR
76.definition: About the pillows... I have an idea.

79.speaker: GRIZZLY
79.character: なんだよ 考えって。
79.definition: What's this idea of yours? Oh.

80.speaker: POLAR BEAR
80.character: カレーって 夏にもいいけど 冬にも最高だね!
80.definition: Curry is great in the summer, but it's amazing in winter, too!

81.speaker: GRIZZLY
81.character: そんなことだと思ったぜ。
81.definition: I knew it'd be something like that.

82.speaker: GRIZZLY
82.character: つきあった俺が バカだった。
82.definition: I was an idiot to let you drag me here. Once you finish that, we're going to the sixth floor to look at pillows.

85.character: 今日は 枕買うまで帰さねえぞ!
85.definition: You ain't leaving until I buy a pillow!

86.speaker: POLAR BEAR
86.character: 結局 こういう時って
86.definition: It never fails. At times like these,

87.character: 最初の店で見たやつ買っちゃうんだよね。
87.definition: you end up buying from the first store. The memory foam pillow was good, too.

88.speaker: GRIZZLY
88.character: まぁ これで最高の冬眠ができるぜ。
88.definition: Now I can enjoy a great hibernation.

91.speaker: POLAR BEAR
91.character: 僕 もうちょっと食べられるよ。
91.definition: I can still eat a little more.

92.speaker: GRIZZLY
92.definition: Shut up. All that walking around made me tired. See you next spring. Take care. Yeah, you too.

93.speaker: POLAR BEAR
93.character: まぁ 僕は地球温暖化で
93.definition: Oh, but with global warming happening

94.character: いつまで元気でいられるかわかんないけどね。
94.definition: I may not be energetic for long.

95.speaker: GRIZZLY
95.definition: I can't exactly laugh at that.

97.speaker: POLAR BEAR
97.character: グリズリーくんが 冬眠してる間に

98.character: 隕石が落ちて 地球が破滅してるかもしれないけどね。
98.definition: a meteor may come crashing downand destroy the Earth.

99.speaker: GRIZZLY
99.character: 寝る前に嫌なこと言うんじゃねえよ。
99.definition: Don't say something creepy like that before I'm about to sleep.

100.speaker: GRIZZLY
100.character: というか 寝言は寝てから言え。
100.definition: Or rather, save your sleep talk  for when you're sleeping.

101.speaker: POLAR BEAR
101.character: それかグリズリーくんが 冬眠してる間に
101.definition: Or while you're sleeping, a mouse might bite your ear,

102.speaker: POLAR BEAR
102.character: 体の色が変わっちゃうかもしれないよ。
102.definition: and your body might change color. We'll match.

104.speaker: POLAR BEAR
104.definition: Well, see you again next spring.

108.speaker: POLAR BEAR
108.character: あっ シロクマだけど。

109.speaker: POLAR BEAR
109.character: クリスマスプレゼント迷っちゃってて
109.definition: I'm having some trouble deciding on a Christmas present.

110.speaker: POLAR BEAR
110.character: 相談にのってくれない?

111.speaker: GRIZZLY
111.definition: What are you having trouble with?

112.speaker: POLAR BEAR
112.character: ビールとタラバガニどっちがいいと思う?
112.definition: Beer or king crab... Which do you think is better?

114.speaker: GRIZZLY
114.character: それは お歳暮だろ～!!
114.definition: Those are year-end gifts! Polar Bear's Café

115.speaker: GUY1
115.character: あれ? どうなってんだ?

116.speaker: GUY2
116.character: せっかく来たのになぁ。
116.definition: And I came all this way.

117.speaker: GIRL
117.character: 今日は パンダさん休みなんですか?
117.definition: Are the pandas off today? Huh?

119.speaker: HANDA
119.character: あれ?パンダくんたち来てたのに…。
119.definition: Huh? But the pandas were here...

122.speaker: HANDA
122.character: うぅ… ちょっと!２人とも何やってるんですか!
122.definition: Hey! What are you two doing? Are you sure it's okay to open such an expensive bottle?

123.speaker: HANDA
123.character: 寝ぼけないでください!

125.speaker: PANDA
125.character: 僕なら どこでも寝られるから
125.definition: I can sleep anywhere, so you don't have

127.speaker: HANDA
127.character: 大丈夫じゃないでしょ!

129.speaker: FT PANDA
129.character: 自分ちみたいにくつろぐ感じに働いたらどうかって話になってさ。
129.definition: We were discussing what it'd be like to work as if we were relaxing at home,

130.speaker: FT PANDA
130.character: じゃあ 布団 敷いちゃおうって。
130.definition: so we brought out the futons.

132.speaker: PANDA
132.definition: I'd be okay with doing this part-time job seven days a week, Mr. Handa.

136.speaker: PENGUIN
136.definition: I'm thinking of making a hit song, so could you listen for a sec?

137.speaker: SASAKO
137.character: 今 聴かなくてもいいですか?
137.definition: Is it okay if I don't listen right now?

139.speaker: PENGUIN
139.character: じゃあ… 心の中で歌います。
139.definition: Then I'll just sing it in my head.

140.speaker: PENGUIN
140.character: また落ち込んでるの? パンダくん。

141.speaker: PANDA
141.character: 僕… 半田さんが何考えてるかわからなくなっちゃったよ。
141.definition: I really don't understand what Mr. Handa is thinking anymore.

144.speaker: PANDA
144.definition: We said we'd like to sleep in futons in the office,

145.speaker: PANDA
145.character: 半田さんは ダメだって!
145.definition: but Mr. Handa said we couldn't! Could I get another café mocha, Miss Sasako?

147.speaker: PENGUIN
147.character: 僕はパンダくんが何考えてるかわからないよ。
147.definition: It's you that I don't understand, Panda.

148.speaker: PANDA
148.character: えぇ～ シロクマくんは どう思う?
148.definition: What? What do you think, Polar Bear?

149.speaker: PANDA
149.character: あれっ シロクマくんは?
149.definition: Huh? Where's Polar Bear? He's off today.

150.speaker: PENGUIN
150.character: シロクマくんって 何気に よく遊びに行くよね。
150.definition: Polar Bear goes out quite a bit, doesn't he?

151.speaker: SASAKO
151.character: 今日は大事な用があるって言ってましたよ。
151.definition: He said there was something important he had to do today.

155.speaker: POLAR BEAR
155.definition: What were you up to? I was hibernating!

156.speaker: POLAR BEAR
156.definition: Oh, that's right. You totally knew. Was it that obvious? I'm going back to sleep now. Then... Let's go to the driving range.

157.speaker: GRIZZLY
157.definition: Go away! Let's go! It's not good to do nothing but sleep. That's what hibernating is!

160.speaker: GRIZZLY
160.character: 何なんだよ まったく。

164.speaker: GRIZZLY
164.character: お前が起こしたんだろうが!
164.definition: You're the one who woke me up! Come on, no breaks! Hurry up and hit!

165.speaker: GRIZZLY
165.definition: I want to go home and sleep.

169.speaker: GRIZZLY
169.definition: All right, see you later. Oh, there they are.

172.speaker: POLAR BEAR
172.character: こちら グリズリーくん。

173.speaker: POLAR BEAR
173.character: ペンギンさんと パンダくん。
173.definition: This is Mr. Penguin and Panda.

174.speaker: GRIZZLY
174.character: 知ってるぜ。 なんで来たんだよ?
174.definition: I know that. The hell are they doing here?

175.speaker: POLAR BEAR
175.definition: I think it's because I invited them.

176.speaker: GRIZZLY
176.character: 「呼んだからかなぁ」じゃねえ。

177.speaker: GRIZZLY
177.character: なんで 呼ぶんだよ!

178.speaker: POLAR BEAR
178.character: 久しぶりに会いたいかなって思って。
178.definition: I thought you guys might want to see each other since it's been a while.

179.speaker: GRIZZLY
179.character: 俺は 早く帰って枕に会いてえよ!
179.definition: I want to go home and see my pillow!

180.speaker: POLAR BEAR
180.character: 枕は 逃げないから
180.definition: Well, your pillow isn't going anywhere,

181.speaker: POLAR BEAR
181.character: ちょっとだけ いいじゃない。
181.definition: so a little while with us won't hurt.

182.speaker: POLAR BEAR
182.character: あぁ～!ね みんなで行こう。
182.definition: All right? Let's all go together. Where are we going, Mr. Grizzly?

183.speaker: GRIZZLY
183.definition: Seems like I've got no other choice.

185.speaker: POLAR BEAR
185.character: どうしようか このあと。
185.definition: What should we do now? Let's see...

187.speaker: PENGUIN
187.character: こんな時間に４人で散歩して
187.definition: Why would the four of us go for a walk at this hour?

188.speaker: PANDA
188.character: じゃあ シロクマくん家 行こうよ。
188.definition: Then let's go to Polar Bear's house.

190.speaker: POLAR BEAR
190.character: 今 床で ワカメ干してるから
190.definition: I'm drying kelp on the floor right now.

191.speaker: POLAR BEAR
191.definition: There wouldn't be anywhere to step. What's with that?

192.speaker: PENGUIN
192.character: 言い訳なら もう少し納得できるやつにしてよ。
192.definition: If you're gonna make excuses, at least make them believable. So, what should we do?

194.speaker: PANDA
194.character: 僕 眠くなっちゃった。

196.speaker: PENGUIN
196.definition: What do you want to eat?

197.speaker: PENGUIN
197.character: シロクマくん 何系?
197.definition: What are you in the mood for, Polar Bear? Anything is fine.

198.speaker: PANDA
198.character: 僕は 横になりたいよ。

201.speaker: PENGUIN
201.character: 何でもいいって言ったのに。
201.definition: You just said anything was fine.

202.speaker: PANDA
202.definition: What about your house, Polar Bear?

204.speaker: PENGUIN
204.character: はいはい。足の踏み場がないのね。
204.definition: Yeah, yeah. Nowhere to step, right?

205.speaker: PENGUIN
205.character: わかったよ。う～ん どこにしようか。
205.definition: We got it. Where should we go? How about hot pot?!

207.speaker: GRIZZLY
207.character: もしもし?今から４人 １０分で行くから!
207.definition: Hello? There'll be four of us. Be there in ten minutes.

209.speaker: GRIZZLY
209.character: これ乗って 先に行ってろ。
209.definition: Take this and go on ahead.

210.speaker: GRIZZLY
210.character: 俺 走っていくから!

212.speaker: GRIZZLY
212.character: あぁ～! さぁ 飲め飲め!
212.definition: Come on, drink up! Meat, shrimp, fish, shellfish, green onions!

214.speaker: PANDA
214.definition: This, too! Don't put in the garland chrysanthemum yet.

215.speaker: POLAR BEAR
215.definition: Can I put in the tofu? No, you can't!

216.speaker: GRIZZLY
216.character: よし しばらく待て。
216.definition: All right. Now wait a while.

217.speaker: PENGUIN
217.character: グリズリーくんってこういう仕事してたの?
217.definition: Did you have a job doing this before, Grizzly? The hell do you mean a job?

218.speaker: PENGUIN
218.character: すごい手慣れてるっていうかさ。
218.definition: You seem to know what you're doing.

219.speaker: PANDA
219.character: グリズリーバーやめて 鍋屋さんになればいいよ。
219.definition: Why don't you close Grizzly's Bar and open up a hot pot restaurant?

220.speaker: GRIZZLY
220.character: うるせえ!バーは好きでやってんだ!
220.definition: Shut up. I'm running the bar because I want to.

221.speaker: GRIZZLY
221.character: おら! 飲み物どうすんだよ!
221.definition: Hey! What do you want to drink?

224.character: ビール ピッチャーと オレンジジュース!
224.definition: Could we get a pitcher of beer and an orange juice?

225.speaker: GUY
225.character: あのテーブル すっげえ仕切りだ。

226.speaker: GRIZZLY
226.character: まだ さわんなって!

237.speaker: ALL
237.definition: Thanks for the food. We're making porridge when you're done with that.

239.speaker: PENGUIN
239.character: 熱い! 熱いの苦手だよ～!
239.definition: It's hot! I don't do well with hot.

240.speaker: GRIZZLY
240.definition: And now it's cooled off. Hurry up and eat.

241.speaker: PENGUIN
241.definition: It's delicious! Thanks for everything! More, please.

242.speaker: GRIZZLY
242.character: おら～!すんませ～ん!ビール ピッチャー 追加!
242.definition: Excuse me, could we get another pitcher of beer?

243.speaker: GRIZZLY
243.character: で どうすんだよ? 二次会は。
243.definition: So, where are we going for round two?

244.speaker: GRIZZLY
244.character: カラオケか? バーか?
244.definition: Karaoke? A bar? Majority rules! Karaoke!

245.speaker: GRIZZLY
245.character: なんだ 全員 バーか!
245.definition: What? You all want to go to a bar? Come on, let's go.

247.speaker: GRIZZLY
247.definition: What? I'm tired, so let's go home.

248.speaker: PENGUIN
248.character: 僕も 朝 早かったから眠くなっちゃった。 ふぁ～。
248.definition: I got up early this morning, so I'm tired, too.

249.speaker: PANDA
249.definition: It's okay... I can sleep anywhere... Hey! Don't sleep in the middle of the street!

250.speaker: GRIZZLY
250.definition: I'll take you home. What the hell, you guys.

251.speaker: GRIZZLY
251.character: あ～ もしもし タクシー?

252.speaker: GRIZZLY
252.character: あいつら ふざけやがって。

253.speaker: GRIZZLY
253.character: なんで 冬眠する俺があいつら送ってくんだよ
253.definition: Why the hell did I take them home when I'm supposed to be hibernating? The hell is this?

255.speaker: GRIZZLY
255.character: しようがねえなぁ あいつら。

256.speaker: PANDA
256.character: ペンギンさんペンギンさん

258.speaker: PANDA
258.character: ペンギンさん歴史の一ページに残るようなこと最近した?
258.definition: Have you done anything historically noteworthy lately, Mr. Penguin?

259.speaker: PENGUIN
259.character: 分かると思うけど、してませんね
259.definition: I think you already know this, but no. Mr. Penguin, Mr. Penguin.

261.speaker: PENGUIN
261.definition: Where? Where is it coming from?!

263.speaker: PANDA
263.character: 笹子さんの声近づいてない?
263.definition: Isn't Miss Sasako's voice getting closer?

264.speaker: PENGUIN
264.definition: What is this, some kind of scary story?

265.speaker: SASAKO
265.character: シロクマさん 終わりましょう
265.definition: Let's end this, Mr. Polar Bear.

267.speaker: POLAR BEAR
267.character: 来週のシロクマカフェイは

268.speaker: POLAR BEAR
268.character: 安全第一でお送りします
268.definition: will be presented putting safety first.
